Package ws.rocket.config

The main classes that library users should know about Rocket-Config.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder.BeanWriter<T>
    Section writer factory contract to use when the section reader passes on a Map collection.
    ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder.ReaderFactory<T>
    Factory for defining common section readers.
    ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder.ValueWriter<T>
    Section writer factory contract to use when the section reader supports at least writing the gathered section data to a configuration bean property.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigModel<T>
    Configuration model holds the description of what structure a configuration file may have, how to parse it, and where to write the configuration settings/values (in a bean object).
    ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder<T>
    Configuration model builder defines the language for describing a configuration file sections and their content parsing methods.
    MapConfigModel<T>
    A configuration model that has only one section (type) but can parse a file with multiple section, excepting them all to have same section format.
    Messages
    A simple container for all the error and warning messages generated during parsing and model validation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigException
    Indicates an error or errors that caused the configuration parse process to halt.

Package ws.rocket.config Description

The main classes that library users should know about Rocket-Config. The class to begin with is ConfigModel.
